achievements.title: Cyberzee 2024
achievements.description: Proud to be part of CypherX, the winning team from the University of Ruhuna at CyberZee '24, an inter-university cybersecurity competition. Our team's dedication, problem-solving skills, and technical expertise in cybersecurity challenges led us to secure the championship among top university teams.

achievements.title: Innovate with Ballerina 2025
achievements.description: As the team leader, I guided the development of E-Rides, a comprehensive e-bike rental platform designed to address urban challenges like traffic congestion and pollution. Secured first runners up position among 500 teams.

achievements.title: IEEE Innovation Nation Sri Lanka
achievements.description: As a team member of the award-winning group in the Southern Province competition, secured 1st place with our innovative idea to build an application for online medicine finding for rare medicines.

achievements.title: Tech Triathlon by Root Code
achievements.description: Passed the design challenge, hackathon challenge, and AI challenge to advance to phase 3.

achievements.title: HaXtreme 2.0
achievements.description: Competitive coding competition organized by IEEE Student Branch at University of Ruhuna. Secured 5th place among 80+ teams as team BrainLeft.

achievements.title: IEEE XTreme 17.0
achievements.description: 24-hour global competitive programming competition. As team BrainLeft, placed 90th in Sri Lanka and secured 3rd place at University of Ruhuna.

achievements.title: Eminence 3.0
achievements.description: Inter University Technical Competition with MATLAB, Networking (CISCO Packet Tracer), Competitive Programming, and Innovation tasks. Achieved 6th place as team SparkLink.

achievements.title: MORAUXplore 1.0
achievements.description: UI/UX design competition held by IEEE student branch of University of Moratuwa. Advanced to top 30 teams as team UniMatrix.
